price: 7. Quien haya realizado una buena acción, por pequeña que sea, la verá (recompensada).
arabic: فَمَن يَعۡمَلۡ مِثۡقَالَ ذَرَّةٍ خَيۡرٗا يَرَهُۥ

version.title: Spanish Translation (Latin America) - Noor International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish (Latin America) by Noor International (Ed. 2017)

meta.transliteration: faman yaʿmal mith'qāla dharratin khayran yarahu
